# This .gitignore file should be placed at the root of your Unity project directory

# Ignore the following directories
[Ll]ibrary/
[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Ll]ogs/
MemoryCaptures/
AssetBundles/

# Avoid committing package files that should be auto-resolved
[Pp]ackages/manifest.json
[Pp]ackages/package-lock.json

# Project-specific settings (optional, you can track this if needed)
# !/[Pp]rojectSettings/

# Visual Studio project files
.vs/
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.userprefs
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.svd
*.pdb
*.opendb
*.VC.db

# Mono auto generated files
mono_crash.*

# Ignore generated Gradle and Android build files
.gradle/
build/
*.apk
*.aab
*.obb

# Ignore temporary files created by JetBrains Rider
.idea/
*.idea/
.idea/*
*.sln.iml
.idea/.idea/

# Ignore Unity-generated files
*.pidb
*.unitypackage
*.tmp
*.obj

# Ignore system and user-specific files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
*.swp
*.lock
*.log
*.tmp
